title: RIOT refuses to help me

embed.description: i have written several emails trying to recover my account and the only thing ive heard from you guys in days is"how did we do" bullshit. my account isn't banned, and ive been VERY patient trying to get my account back this month. someone PLEASE help me. Request #23793533

body: i have been trying to get SOMEONE to help me. it seams all of riot has done nothing but ignore me for the past two weeks ive been trying to get my account recovered.  ill leave 10000 post on this forum if i have to just to get someone to do their job and help me retrieve my account. this is the worst customer service i have EVER experienced in any company.

replies.body: is there a number i can call or something? two weeks of dealing with this and for some reason, getting an account back is the most difficult thing in the world
no, they havent. i received another players email to riot about how their account was banned

Losing access to an account really does suck. Unforuntaltey, we're not able to handle these types of requests on the boards, due to the sensitive information they contain. I checked your requests from your previous post and it looks like one of our account specialists has already reached out to you. You'll need to continue working with that specialist in order to receive assistance with this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
